member.name: T:_Library_Management_System_.Controllers.AuthController
member.summary: Handles authentication-related operations such as user registration and login.

member.name: M:_Library_Management_System_.Controllers.AuthController.#ctor(AppDbContext,JwtTokenGenerator,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{_Library_Management_System_.Controllers.AuthController})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AuthController class.

member.name: M:_Library_Management_System_.Controllers.AuthController.Register(RegisterRequest)
member.summary: Registers a new user with the provided details.
member.param: The registration request containing user details.
member.returns: An IActionResult indicating success or failure of registration.

member.name: M:_Library_Management_System_.Controllers.AuthController.Login(LoginRequest)
member.summary: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token upon successful login.
member.param: The login request containing email and password.
member.returns: An IActionResult containing the JWT token or an error message.

member.name: M:BooksController.#ctor(IBookService)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BooksController class.

member.name: M:BooksController.GetBook(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific book by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the book to retrieve.
member.returns: An IActionResult containing the book or NotFound if not found.

member.name: M:BooksController.GetExternalBookDetails(System.Int32,IExternalBookService)
member.summary: Simulates fetching book details from an external API
